009package Ch21_GeometricOperations;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
012import static java.lang.Math.sqrt;
013
014import ij.ImagePlus;
015import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
016import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
017import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
018import imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.Mapping2D;
019import imagingbook.common.image.ImageMapper;
020import imagingbook.common.image.OutOfBoundsStrategy;
021import imagingbook.common.image.interpolation.InterpolationMethod;
022
023public class Map_Spherical implements PlugInFilter {
024        
025        static double rho = 1.8;
026        
027        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
028                return DOES_ALL;
029        }
030
031        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
032                final double xc = 0.5 * ip.getWidth();
033                final double yc = 0.5 * ip.getHeight();
034                final double rmax = Math.min(xc, yc); //Math.sqrt(xc * xc + yc * yc);
035                final double rmax2 = sqr(rmax);
036                final double rhoFac = (1.0 - 1.0 / rho);
037
038                Mapping2D imap = new Mapping2D() {
039                        
040                        @Override
041                        public Pnt2d applyTo(Pnt2d uv) {
042                                double u = uv.getX();
043                                double v = uv.getY();
044                                double dx = u - xc;
045                                double dy = v - yc;
046                                double dx2 = sqr(dx);
047                                double dy2 = sqr(dy);
048                                double r2 = dx2 + dy2;
049
050                                if (r2 < rmax2) {
051                                        double z2 = rmax2 - r2;
052                                        double z = sqrt(z2);
053
054                                        double betaX = rhoFac * Math.asin(dx / sqrt(dx2 + z2));
055                                        double x = u - z * Math.tan(betaX);
056
057                                        double betaY = rhoFac * Math.asin(dy / sqrt(dy2 + z2));
058                                        double y = v - z * Math.tan(betaY);
059                                        return Pnt2d.from(x, y);
060                                }
061                                else { // otherwise leave point unchanged
062                                        return uv;
063                                }
064                        }
065                };
066                
067                new ImageMapper(imap, OutOfBoundsStrategy.ZeroValues, InterpolationMethod.Bicubic).map(ip);
068        }
069}
